author: Special Correspondent
text:
In response to repeated questions by BSP leader Mayawati and sloganeering over the committee probing the suicide of Dalit scholar Rohith Vemula, HRD Minister Smriti Irani said in the Rajya Sabha on Wednesday: “Mayawatiji, I request, you are a senior member and a woman, you want an answer, I am ready to reply. If you are not satisfied with my answer, I will cut my head and put it at your feet.”

In response, Ms. Mayawati asked whether a Dalit member would be on the judicial committee.

“A Dalit professor was there whose decision you would not have accepted. You want to say, Mayawatiji, a Dalit is a Dalit only if Mayawatiji gives a certificate?” Ms. Irani said.

Angry exchanges took place between Ms. Irani and Ms. Mayawati amid the din.
title: Can one be a Dalit only if Mayawati certifies it: Smriti
